signup-sentence: If don't have an account, create your own.
signin-sentence: If you have already an account, Sign in
You have to approve your account from Ad: You have to take the approve from the admin of this website
provide unique name: The name already exists, enter another name
provide unique username: The username already exists, enter another username
password-length: The password should be greater than or equals to 8 characters
confirm-password-length: The confirm password should be greater than or equals to 8 characters
unequal-passwords: The password and confirm password don't match.
thank-message: Thank you for joining our family. Pharma link's family
approve-message: Will send you a confirm message on your mobile
